Subskills.name: Hawk Eye
Subskills.description: Increases attack rating when using volatile shot.

Subskills.name: Cannon Fodder
Subskills.description: Increases the damage dealt by volatile shot.

Subskills.name: Colossal Arrow
Subskills.description: Fire a massive arrow with increased damage and increased armor break duration. Volatile shot now has a cooldown.

Subskills.name: Far Sight
Subskills.description: Increases the attack range of volatile shot.

Subskills.name: Techies
Subskills.description: Now knocks monsters back with increased damage.

Subskills.name: Explosive Tactics
Subskills.description: Increases the explosion area of effect radius of volatile shot.

Subskills.name: Armor Swap
Subskills.description: Gain a portion of inflicted armor break as armor for a short duration.

Subskills.name: Artillery
Subskills.description: Fire multiple additional arrows raining from the sky covering a wide area. Volatile shot now has a short cooldown.

Subskills.name: Strafing
Subskills.description: Decreases the movement diminish when using volatile shot.

Subskills.name: Devastation
Subskills.description: Chance to stun monsters on hit.

Subskills.name: Military Tactics
Subskills.description: Increases damage dealt to stunned targets.

Subskills.name: Volatile Multishot
Subskills.description: Fire multiple smaller projectiles in a cone.

Subskills.name: Fire in the Hole
Subskills.description: On monster or terrain impact launch multiple piercing arrows in all directions.
